attributes.title: DONT WASTE YOUR TIME
attributes.review: this app is awful ughhh when i downloaded it it kept glitching and it took so long to even download in the first place it’s juss terrible 0/10 i don’t recommend

attributes.title: Awful App

attributes.title: Disgusted

attributes.title: Review
attributes.review: This is the worst app the could be downloaded, first Trump had to be president if that is t as bad, then this app was made. This is unacceptable we demand that this app be taken down from the App Store immediately.

attributes.title: Horrible innapropriate app
attributes.review: I got this for my kids to learn about trump and how to match foundation, but it was so laggy, showed hardcore porn when I opened it, and I should’ve given it -900 stars instead of 1. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE ✨
attributes.review: This app took 5 and a half hours to download.. considering the fact that I have good internet, and the entire app itself just glitched as soon as it finished downloading.
